import React, { Component } from "react"; import "./App.css"; import { TweenMax, Power4 } from "gsap"; var rotation = 0; let wheel = document.getElementById("wheel"); // import Confetti from 'react-confetti' // const { width, height } = useWindowSize() export default class App extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { score: 0, guessedLetters: [], correctLetters: [ "H", "A", "P", "Y", "S", "T", "D", "F", "R", "O", "M", "W", "N" ], currentWheelValue: 500 }; this.spinWheel = this.spinWheel.bind(this); } spinWheel() { document.getElementById("wheel").classList.add("wheel-animated"); // console.log((Math.random*10)) //spin wheel, set state to what the wheel is at this.setState({ currentWheelValue: 500 }); // let randomNum = Math.floor(Math.random() * 10); // let duration = Math.floor(100); // rotation += 30 * duration + 30 * randomNum; // if(this.state.currentWheelValue!== 0){ // } //do UI stuff, make spin random } checkGuess() { //prompt user for a guess, check if the letter was already guessed. // if not, then it checks if it is in the correct letters array // adds/subtracts score based on current wheel value depending on correct/incorrect answer // this.spinWheel(); var input = prompt("test"); var guess = ""; if (input !== null) { guess = input.toUpperCase(); } if (this.state.guessedLetters.includes(guess)) { alert("You already guessed this"); this.checkGuess(); } else { if (this.state.correctLetters.includes(guess)) { this.setState({ score: this.state.score + this.state.currentWheelValue }); this.state.guessedLetters.push(guess); this.addToBoard(guess); // if (this.state.guessedLetters.includes) { // alert("u win"); // } } else { var newScore = this.state.score - this.state.currentWheelValue; this.state.guessedLetters.push(guess); this.setState({ score: newScore }); } } } addToBoard(correctLetter) { //adds letter to board // check at the end if all letters are added, disable spin button var store = document.querySelectorAll(".inner " + "." + correctLetter); for (var i = 0; i < store.length; i++) { store[i].innerHTML = "

" + correctLetter + "

"; } } render() { return (
Luck O' The Irish Luck O' The Irish
{/* --------- Row 1 */}

{/* --------- Row 2 */}

.

'

{/* --------- Row 3 */}

Score: {this.state.score}
